name: The Cowlitz Gamers' 2nd Adventure
description:
Play alone or with a friend as you help Kaylee–and her brother, Justice–run, jump, duck, and climb their way out of perilous mines and up a massive tower!

Collect gold, uncover diamonds, reveal secrets, and unlock new characters as you traverse the treacherous terrain and avoid the creepy crawlies that lie ahead!

  • NES ROM - Play it how you want—on a flash cart or emulator of your choice.
  • Over 50 screens of classic platforming action
  • 2-player arcade-style co-op
  • 4 additional unlockable character pairs
  • Bonus Game - Download Pack also includes 2016's Cowlitz Gamers Adventure, the game's predecessor.
